solution.text:
Since New price > Old price, Increase = New price - Old price.
Increase = _{{6000*j}}_ - _{{5000*j}}_ = Rs. _{{1000*j}}_
Increase percentage = (Increase/Old price) x 100
\( \Rightarrow \) Therefore, increase percentage = (_{{1000*j}}_/_{{5000*j}}_) x 100 = 20%

content.text: Price of a refrigerator going from Rs. _{{5000 *j}}_ to _{{6000*j}}_ the next year.
